languages.text: "Сожалею, но нет... если бы в нашем распоряжении был наш корабль и экипаж, мы могли бы оказаться в безопасности за его стенами, отправиться на разведку боем, в конце-концов сложить свои головы в битве с ксеносами, как то и подобает слугам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g}!.. Однако мы лишены наших обычных возможностей. Остается полагаться только на наше оружие и смекалку".

traits.locale_text: "Сожалею, но нет... если бы в нашем распоряжении был наш корабль и экипаж, мы могли бы оказаться в безопасности за его стенами, отправиться на разведку боем, в конце-концов сложить свои головы в битве с ксеносами, как то и подобает слугам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g}!.. Однако мы лишены наших обычных возможностей. Остается полагаться только на наше оружие и смекалку".

languages.text: "I am sorry to say I do not... If we had our ship and crew at our disposal, we could be safely within its walls, conduct reconnaissance of this place, and, in the end, meet our deaths in battle against the xenos as befits true servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}! However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."
languages.original_text: "Сожалею, но нет... если бы в нашем распоряжении был наш корабль и экипаж, мы могли бы оказаться в безопасности за его стенами, отправиться на разведку боем, в конце-концов сложить свои головы в битве с ксеносами, как то и подобает слугам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g}!.. Однако мы лишены наших обычных возможностей. Остается полагаться только на наше оружие и смекалку".

If we had our ship and crew at our disposal, we could be safely within its walls, conduct reconnaissance of this place, and, in the end, meet our deaths in battle against the xenos as befits true servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}! However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."

"I am sorry to say I do not... If we had our ship and crew at our disposal, we could be safely within its walls, conduct reconnaissance of this place, and, in the end, meet our deaths in battle against the xenos as befits true servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}! However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."

"I am sorry to say I do not... However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."

"I am sorry to say I do not... If we had our ship and crew at our disposal, we could be safely within its walls, conduct reconnaissance of this place, and, in the end, meet our deaths in battle against the xenos as befits true servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}! However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."

languages.text: “很抱歉，恐怕我没有想法……如果我们的船和船员都在身边，我们可以躲在舰船之内对这片地区进行侦查，最后与异形大战一场，壮烈阵亡，这才符合{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}真正仆人的身份！可现在，我们习以为常的资源都被剥夺了，只能依靠我们的武器与智慧。”
languages.original_text: "I am sorry to say I do not... If we had our ship and crew at our disposal, we could be safely within its walls, conduct reconnaissance of this place, and, in the end, meet our deaths in battle against the xenos as befits true servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}! However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."

traits.locale_text: “很抱歉，恐怕我没有想法……如果我们的船和船员都在身边，我们可以躲在舰船之内对这片地区进行侦查，最后与异形大战一场，壮烈阵亡，这才符合{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}真正仆人的身份！可现在，我们习以为常的资源都被剥夺了，只能依靠我们的武器与智慧。”

languages.original_text: "I am sorry to say I do not... If we had our ship and crew at our disposal, we could be safely within its walls, conduct reconnaissance of this place, and, in the end, meet our deaths in battle against the xenos as befits true servants of the God-Emperor! However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."

languages.text: «Mucho me temo que no. Si tuviéramos acceso a nuestra nave y tripulación, podríamos refugiarnos en sus paredes, ejecutar tareas de reconocimiento y, al final, ¡morir en combate contra los xenos como dignos sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}! Sin embargo, sin nuestros recursos habituales tenemos que depender de nuestras armas y nuestro ingenio».
languages.original_text: "I am sorry to say I do not... If we had our ship and crew at our disposal, we could be safely within its walls, conduct reconnaissance of this place, and, in the end, meet our deaths in battle against the xenos as befits true servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}! However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."

traits.locale_text: «Mucho me temo que no. Si tuviéramos acceso a nuestra nave y tripulación, podríamos refugiarnos en sus paredes, ejecutar tareas de reconocimiento y, al final, ¡morir en combate contra los xenos como dignos sirvientes del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}! Sin embargo, sin nuestros recursos habituales tenemos que depender de nuestras armas y nuestro ingenio».

languages.text: 「残念ながら、そうではありません…もし我々の船と乗組員が自由に使えれば、安全に壁の中に入り、この場所を偵察し、最後には{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}の真のしもべにふさわしく、異種族との戦いで死を迎えることができた！ですが、我々は資源を奪われてしまった。今頼れるのは武器と知恵だけなのです」
languages.original_text: "I am sorry to say I do not... If we had our ship and crew at our disposal, we could be safely within its walls, conduct reconnaissance of this place, and, in the end, meet our deaths in battle against the xenos as befits true servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}! However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、そうではありません…もし我々の船と乗組員が自由に使えれば、安全に壁の中に入り、この場所を偵察し、最後には{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}の真のしもべにふさわしく、異種族との戦いで死を迎えることができた！ですが、我々は資源を奪われてしまった。今頼れるのは武器と知恵だけなのです」

languages.text: "Ich fürchte nicht, nein ... Hätten wir unser Schiff und seine Crew zur Verfügung, so wären wir an Bord sicher, könnten den Feind auskundschaften und dann im Kampf gegen die Xenos den Tod finden, wie es sich für wahre Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperators{/g} geziemt! Leider jedoch sind wir unserer üblichen Ressourcen beraubt. Wir können uns nur auf unsere Waffen und unseren Verstand verlassen."
languages.original_text: "I am sorry to say I do not... If we had our ship and crew at our disposal, we could be safely within its walls, conduct reconnaissance of this place, and, in the end, meet our deaths in battle against the xenos as befits true servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}! However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte nicht, nein ... Hätten wir unser Schiff und seine Crew zur Verfügung, so wären wir an Bord sicher, könnten den Feind auskundschaften und dann im Kampf gegen die Xenos den Tod finden, wie es sich für wahre Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperators{/g} geziemt! Leider jedoch sind wir unserer üblichen Ressourcen beraubt. Wir können uns nur auf unsere Waffen und unseren Verstand verlassen."

languages.text: « Je suis navré, mais non... Si nous avions notre vaisseau et son équipage à notre disposition, nous pourrions reconnaître ces lieux tout en restant à l'abri, puis nous irions trouver la mort en combattant les xénos comme tout digne serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} ! Hélas, nous sommes privés de nos ressources habituelles. Nous pouvons seulement compter sur nos armes et notre présence d'esprit. »
languages.original_text: "I am sorry to say I do not... If we had our ship and crew at our disposal, we could be safely within its walls, conduct reconnaissance of this place, and, in the end, meet our deaths in battle against the xenos as befits true servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}! However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis navré, mais non... Si nous avions notre vaisseau et son équipage à notre disposition, nous pourrions reconnaître ces lieux tout en restant à l'abri, puis nous irions trouver la mort en combattant les xénos comme tout digne serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} ! Hélas, nous sommes privés de nos ressources habituelles. Nous pouvons seulement compter sur nos armes et notre présence d'esprit. »

languages.text: "Maalesef yok... Gemimize ve tayfamıza erişebilseydik güvende olur, bölgeyi gözlemler ve nihayet {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator'un{/g} sahih hizmetkârlarına yaraşır bir şekilde zenolarla savaşırken can verirdik! Fakat alışık olduğumuz kaynaklara şu anda sahip değiliz. Bu durumda yalnızca aklımıza ve silahlarımıza güvenebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "I am sorry to say I do not... If we had our ship and crew at our disposal, we could be safely within its walls, conduct reconnaissance of this place, and, in the end, meet our deaths in battle against the xenos as befits true servants of the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}! However, we are deprived of our usual resources. Now we can only rely on our weapons and our wits."

traits.locale_text: "Maalesef yok... Gemimize ve tayfamıza erişebilseydik güvende olur, bölgeyi gözlemler ve nihayet {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator{/g}'un sahih hizmetkârlarına yaraşır bir şekilde zenolarla savaşırken can verirdik! Fakat alışık olduğumuz kaynaklara şu anda sahip değiliz. Bu durumda yalnızca aklımıza ve silahlarımıza güvenebiliriz."
